mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NAME ,u.USER_SOCIAL_SECUNUM ,u.USER_SEX ,u.USER_COMP ,u.USER_COMP_ENTERDATE ,u.USER_DEPT ,u.USER_SPOT ,u.USER_ARMY_SERV ,u.USER_MARITAL_STATUS ,u.USER_ARMY_SERV_ENTER ,u.USER_ARMY_SERV_LEAVE ,u.USER_ARMY_SERV_PERIOD ,u.USER_TELNUM_WIRED ,u.USER_TELNUM_WIRELESS ,u.USER_EMAIL ,u.USER_ZIPCODE ,u.USER_ADDRESS ,c.CAREER_COMP_NAME ,c.CAREER_ENTERDATE ,c.CAREER_LEAVEDATE ,c.CAREER_SPOT ,c.CAREER_RESPONSIB ,e.EDU_SCHOOL_NAME ,e.EDU_STATUS ,e.EDU_GRADUATION ,l.LICEN_NAME ,l.LICEN_SKILL_LEVEL ,q.QUALIFI_NAME ,q.QUALIFI_GETDATE ,s.SKILL_PROJECT_NAME ,s.SKILL_STARTDATE ,s.SKILL_ENDDATE ,s.SKILL_CUSTOMER_COMP ,s.SKILL_WORK_COMP ,s.SKILL_APPLIED ,s.SKILL_INDUSTRY ,s.SKILL_ROLE ,s.SKILL_MODEL ,s.SKILL_OS ,s.SKILL_LANG ,s.SKILL_DBMS ,s.SKILL_COMM ,s.SKILL_TOOL ,s.SKILL_ETC ,t.TRAINING_NAME ,t.TRAINING_STARTDATE ,t.TRAINING_ENDDATE ,t.TRAINING_AGENCY ,b.BODY_BLOOD_TYPE ,b.BODY_WEIGHT ,b.BODY_HEIGHT ,b.BODY_EYESIGHT_LEFT ,b.BODY_EYESIGHT_RIGHT FROM user_info u ,user_info_career c ,user_info_edu e ,user_info_licen l ,user_info_qualifi q ,user_info_skill s ,user_info_training t ,user_info_body b WHERE c.user_idx=e.user_idx and e.user_idx=l.user_idx and l.user_idx=q.user_idx and q.user_idx=s.user_idx and s.user_idx=t.user_idx and t.user_idx=b.user_idx and b.user_idx=u.userIdx and u.user_idx=#{userIdx}

SELECT USER_IDX as userIdx ,USER_REGISTER_DATE as userRegisterDate ,USER_NAME as userName ,USER_COMP as userComp ,USER_DEPT as userDept FROM (SELECT B.USER_IDX ,B.USER_REGISTER_DATE ,B.USER_NAME ,B.USER_COMP ,B.USER_DEPT ,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT USER_IDX ,USER_REGISTER_DATE ,USER_NAME ,USER_COMP ,USER_DEPT FROM USER_INFO
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '%${userListSearchWord}%'
WHERE USER_COMP LIKE '%${userListSearchWord}%'
WHERE USER_DEPT LIKE '%${userListSearchWord}%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC )B WHERE
rownum<=#{pageNo}*#{userInfoDataSize}
) WHERE RNUM>=(#{pageNo}-1)*#{userInfoDataSize} + 1
